alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:31AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rockdale, central DeKalb and southwestern Gwinnett Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1231 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lilburn, or 9 miles southwest of Lawrenceville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Snellville, Lilburn, Norcross, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Tucker, Lakeview Estates, Belvedere Park, Mountain Park, Belmont, Big Haynes Creek Park and Redan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
